Author: pokeocchio
Text: if you feel comfortable with eating prunes, those definitely help get the system going.  also make sure you keep your fluids up! i know i sound like one of those instagram pages but water will genuinely help get things out. i've been here and i know how uncomfortable it is, hope things get better x  also, if nothing happens, perhaps get your boyfriend to watch you have the laxative (ensuring it's the correct dosage) and get him to throw them away at a public place or flush them or something.
